outline:
1. crash, make a din or crash, crash into ruins, be in ruins, be desolated
    1. (Qal) to crash into ruins
    2. (Niphal)
      1. to be ruined
      2. to crash
      3. to be left (a desolation)
    3. (Hiphil)
      1. to cause to crash
      2. to cause to be desolated
strongs_def: to rush; by implication, to desolate
